chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
empty: A

Goal:
forall (n : nat) (l : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), n = length l -> cover l t -> In t (all_cover_aux l n)

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
all_cover_aux = fix all_cover_aux (l : list (btree A)) (n : nat) {struct n} : list (btree A) := match n with | 0 => [] | S n1 => flat_map (fun l1 : list (btree A) => match l1 with | [] => [] | [a] => [a] | a :: b :: l2 => all_cover_aux (node a b :: l2) n1 end) (all_permutations l) end : list (btree A) -> nat -> list (btree A) Arguments all_cover_aux _%list_scope _%nat_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
length : forall A : Type, list A -> nat
Inductive btree (A : Type) : Type := leaf : A -> btree A | node : btree A -> btree A -> btree A Arguments btree _%type_scope Arguments leaf [A]%type_scope Arguments node [A]%type_scope
Inductive cover : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop := cover_one : forall t : btree A, cover [t] t | cover_node : forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> cover l1 t3 Arguments cover _%list_scope Arguments cover_node (_ _)%list_scope
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Fin.t (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
all_cover_aux_cover : forall (n : nat) (l : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), n = length l -> In t (all_cover_aux l n) -> cover l t
all_cover_cover : forall (l : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), In t (all_cover l) -> cover l t
cover_not_nil : forall (l : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), cover l t -> l <> []
cover_inv_leaf_aux : forall (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), cover l t -> forall a : A, t = leaf a -> l = [leaf a]
one_cover_ex : forall l : list (btree A), l <> [] -> exists t : btree A, cover l t
cover_permutation : forall (t : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), cover l1 t -> permutation l1 l2 -> cover l2 t
cover_number_of_nodes : forall (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), cover l t -> number_of_nodes t = fold_left (fun (x : nat) (y : btree A) => x + number_of_nodes y) l 0 + Init.Nat.pred (length l)
cover_in_inb : forall (l : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 : btree A), cover l t1 -> In t2 l -> inb t2 t1
cover_inv_app_aux : forall (t t1 t2 : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), cover l t -> t = node t1 t2 -> l = [node t1 t2] \/ (exists l1 l2 : list (btree A), (cover l1 t1 /\ cover l2 t2) /\ permutation l (l1 ++ l2))
cover_sind : forall P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> SProp, (forall t : btree A, P [t] t) -> (forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P l1 t3) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), cover l b -> P l b
cover_ind : forall P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop, (forall t : btree A, P [t] t) -> (forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P l1 t3) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), cover l b -> P l b
cover_in_inb_inb : forall (l : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), cover l t1 -> In t2 l -> inb t3 t2 -> inb t3 t1
removelast_firstn : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l : list A), n < length l -> removelast (firstn (S n) l) = firstn n l
nth_In : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l : list A) (d : A), n < length l -> In (nth n l d) l
all_permutations_aux_permutation : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 l2 : list A), n = length l2 -> In l1 (all_permutations_aux A l2 n) -> permutation l1 l2
permutation_all_permutations_aux : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 l2 : list A), n = length l2 -> permutation l1 l2 -> In l1 (all_permutations_aux A l2 n)
firstn_all2 : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l : list A), length l <= n -> firstn n l = l
skipn_all2 : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l : list A), length l <= n -> skipn n l = []
inCompute_inb : forall (A : Type) (t : btree A) (a : A) (l : list bool), In (a, l) (compute_code t) -> inb (leaf a) t
innodeL : forall (A : Type) (t t1 t2 : btree A), inb t t1 -> inb t (node t1 t2)
innodeR : forall (A : Type) (t t1 t2 : btree A), inb t t2 -> inb t (node t1 t2)
cover_one : forall t : btree A, cover [t] t
all_leaves_inb : forall (A : Type) (t : btree A) (a : A), In a (all_leaves t) -> inb (leaf a) t
all_leaves_in : forall (A : Type) (t : btree A) (a : A), inb (leaf a) t -> In a (all_leaves t)
inb_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : btree A -> btree A -> Prop), (forall t : btree A, P t t) -> (forall t t1 t2 : btree A, inb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (node t1 t2)) -> (forall t t1 t2 : btree A, inb t t2 -> P t t2 -> P t (node t1 t2)) -> forall b b0 : btree A, inb b b0 -> P b b0
inb_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : btree A -> btree A -> SProp), (forall t : btree A, P t t) -> (forall t t1 t2 : btree A, inb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (node t1 t2)) -> (forall t t1 t2 : btree A, inb t t2 -> P t t2 -> P t (node t1 t2)) -> forall b b0 : btree A, inb b b0 -> P b b0
inleaf : forall (A : Type) (t : btree A), inb t t
btree_unique_prefix : forall (A : Type) (t : btree A), distinct_leaves t -> unique_prefix (compute_code t)
all_leaves_unique : forall (A : Type) (t : btree A), ulist (all_leaves t) -> distinct_leaves t
btree_unique_prefix2 : forall (A : Type) (t : btree A), distinct_leaves t -> unique_key (compute_code t)
